allPostsData.title: My Custom Game Engine in C++ and JavaScript
allPostsData.description: My journey of creating a game engine with online multiplayer, JavaScript for scripting, and real-time lighting.
allPostsData.author: Hao Qi Wu

allPostsData.title: Making a Discord Bot for Nintendo 3DS
allPostsData.description: Creating a Discord bot in C++ that runs on the Nintendo 3DS. Using WebSockets, TLS encryption to get messages from Discord and send messages to Discord. Using the Homebrew SDK to create Nintendo 3DS apps.
allPostsData.author: Hao Qi Wu

allPostsData.title: Video Game Graphics - Make a Game Engine
allPostsData.description: The basics of texture mapping and rendering a square with an animated texture. Written in Three.js.
allPostsData.author: Hao Qi Wu

allPostsData.title: I made a 3D Website
allPostsData.description: The techniques used to create a website with 3D PBR models and seamlessly include HTML as part of a 3D scene. Made using Next.js, React.js, and Three.js.
allPostsData.author: Hao Qi Wu

allPostsData.title: Playing DOOM as my Math Project
allPostsData.description: A Math project where I got to play DOOM in the classroom and answer math question to study for a test.
allPostsData.author: Hao Qi Wu

allPostsData.title: Sleepy Discord Turns 3 Years Old
allPostsData.description: Changes that were made to the Discord library, Sleepy Discord, in 2019 and it's future plans.
allPostsData.author: Sleepy Flower Girl
